Camera mmg tak rilek eh. Ke kiri kanan depan belakang. Part lawan ke jeti ke tgh bersilat ke. X rilek eh.

tweet-body-translated:
After watching the glossy movie.

The camera is not relaxing. Left right front back. Part opponent to jetty to tgh bersilat to. X relax eh.

It’s time to chat with a lot of people, it’s time to change shots every 2 seconds. Eye pain, loss of focus. Suddenly the drone shot, go back in for a close up shot.

tweet-body-text:
Bila cerita pasal Mat Kilau, mesti orang nak tahu contohnya:
-Siapa mat kilau?
-Bagaimana jalan hidup beliau?
-Siapa guru beliau?

Contoh terbaik movie Merong Mahawangsa. Character building mantap. 

Cuma teknologi, bajet, tidak sesuai & sejarah Merong jauh lebih kompleks.
tweet-body-translated:
When talking about Mat Kilau, people must want to know for example:
-Who is the glitter mat?
-How is his life?
-Who is his teacher?

The best example of Merong Mahawangsa movie. Character building is solid.

It’s just that the technology, the budget, it’s not suitable & the history of Merong is much more complex.
tweet-body-translated-corrected:
When talking about Mat Kilau, people must want to know for example:
-Who is the Mat Kilau?
-How is his life?
-Who is his teacher?

The best example of Merong Mahawangsa movie. Character building is solid.

It’s just that the technology, the budget, it’s not suitable & the history of Merong is much more complex.
